About Me

Let me tell you a litle about myself and what I do...

Your project is in safe hands

I've been learning web development on my own for about a year now, besides that I am a computer science student at Sacramento State University. I love to make things look nice, I pay attention to every detail of the website to make sure everything looks right, I can create full stack web applications using HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, JS, Node.js, MongoDB, and React and I make them responsive on mobile. I would love to make websites for clients
